channel.title: New Idea : Gem UPGRADING
channel.description:
[size=50pt]READ AND COMMEND ON IT PLZ[/size]
Ok i,d just saved my source,i was so damn lucky that my files where not fully compiled so i could backup from the client.class after i decompressd it whit a java app.
now that im back in the running ive tought of a new idea,GEM swords
JUST HEAR ME OUT and reply PLZ!
-You have cutted gems (saphire,emerald,ruby,diamond,dragonstone,onyx)
-Ones you have done a quest you will be able to absorb ~1~ Cutted Gem
-The gems have several effects and ones absorbed thej can NOT be taken out only be overwrited by another gem
-I will make an extra equipment slot to put the gem in (this will be tekst based)
THE EFFECTS
Emerald(jewel of nature) = 5% faster farming,fishing,mining,woodcutting
Saphire(jewel of air) = 50% faster energy healing
Ruby(jewel of anger) = 20% more chance on getting a counter hit
Diamond(jewel of kingdom) = 10-30% more gold
Dragonstone(jewel of forgivness) = 5% more combat EXP
Onyx(jewel of life) = every 60 seconds +1Hp
